trans-unit.source: Add-ins for Outlook Mobile
trans-unit.target: Outlook Mobile 的增益集

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Add-ins are available on Outlook for iOS. Outlook for Android support is coming soon.
trans-unit.target: **附註：**增益集可用於 iOS 版 Outlook。即將推出 Android 版 Outlook 支援。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Add-ins are available on Outlook for iOS.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** Add-ins are available on Outlook for iOS.

trans-unit.source: Outlook for Android support is coming soon.
trans-unit.target: Outlook for Android support is coming soon.

trans-unit.source: Add-ins now work on Outlook Mobile, using the same APIs available for other Outlook endpoints. If you've built an add-in for Outlook already, it's easy to get it working on Outlook Mobile.
trans-unit.target: 增益集現在可在 Outlook Mobile 上運作，並使用其他 Outlook 端點可用的相同 API。如果您已建立適用於 Outlook 的增益集，很容易就能讓它在 Outlook Mobile 上運作。

trans-unit.source: Add-ins now work on Outlook Mobile, using the same APIs available for other Outlook endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Add-ins now work on Outlook Mobile, using the same APIs available for other Outlook endpoints.

trans-unit.source: If you've built an add-in for Outlook already, it's easy to get it working on Outlook Mobile.
trans-unit.target: If you've built an add-in for Outlook already, it's easy to get it working on Outlook Mobile.

trans-unit.source: Outlook Mobile Add-ins are supported on all Office 365 Commercial accounts, and support is rolling out to Outlook.com accounts.
trans-unit.target: 所有 Office 365 Commercial 帳戶都支援 Outlook Mobile 增益集，而此支援也推至 Outlook.com 帳戶。

trans-unit.source: **An example taskpane in Outlook for iOS**
trans-unit.target: **iOS 版 Outlook 中的範例工作窗格**

trans-unit.source: A screenshot of a taskpane in Outlook for iOS
trans-unit.target: iOS 版 Outlook 中的工作窗格螢幕擷取畫面

trans-unit.source: What's different on mobile?
trans-unit.target: 在行動裝置上有何差異？

trans-unit.source: The small size and quick interactions make designing for mobile a challenge. To ensure quality experiences for our customers, we are setting strict validation criteria that must be met by an add-in declaring mobile support, in order to be approved in the Office Store.
trans-unit.target: 尺寸小和快速互動，讓設計行動裝置成為一大挑戰。為了確保我們的客戶經驗品質，我們設定了嚴格的驗證準則，而宣告行動支援的增益集必須符合該準則，才能獲准在 Office 市集中上架。

trans-unit.source: The small size and quick interactions make designing for mobile a challenge.
trans-unit.target: The small size and quick interactions make designing for mobile a challenge.

trans-unit.source: To ensure quality experiences for our customers, we are setting strict validation criteria that must be met by an add-in declaring mobile support, in order to be approved in the Office Store.
trans-unit.target: To ensure quality experiences for our customers, we are setting strict validation criteria that must be met by an add-in declaring mobile support, in order to be approved in the Office Store.

trans-unit.source: The add-in **MUST** adhere to the [UI guidelines](./outlook-addin-design.md).
trans-unit.target: 增益集**必須**遵守 [UI 指導方針](./outlook-addin-design.md)。

trans-unit.source: The scenario for the add-in **MUST** [make sense on mobile](#what-makes-a-good-scenario-for-mobile-add-ins).
trans-unit.target: 增益集的案例**必須**[在行動裝置具有意義](#what-makes-a-good-scenario-for-mobile-add-ins)。

trans-unit.source: Only mail read is supported at this time. That means `MobileMessageReadCommandSurface` is the only [ExtensionPoint](../../reference/manifest/extensionpoint.md) you should declare in the mobile section of your manifest
trans-unit.target: 此時僅支援郵件讀取。這表示 `MobileMessageReadCommandSurface` 是您應在資訊清單的 mobile 區段中宣告的唯一 [ExtensionPoint](../../reference/manifest/extensionpoint.md)。

trans-unit.source: Only mail read is supported at this time.
trans-unit.target: Only mail read is supported at this time.

trans-unit.source: That means `MobileMessageReadCommandSurface` is the only [ExtensionPoint](../../reference/manifest/extensionpoint.md) you should declare in the mobile section of your manifest
trans-unit.target: That means `MobileMessageReadCommandSurface` is the only [ExtensionPoint](../../reference/manifest/extensionpoint.md) you should declare in the mobile section of your manifest

trans-unit.source: The [makeEwsRequestAsync](../../reference/outlook/Office.context.mailbox.md) API is not supported on mobile since the mobile app uses REST APIs to communicate with the server. If your app backend needs to connect to the Exchange server, you can use the callback token to make REST API calls. For details, see [Use the Outlook REST APIs from an Outlook add-in](./use-rest-api.md).
trans-unit.target: 行動裝置不支援 [MakeEwsRequestAsync](../../reference/outlook/Office.context.mailbox.md) API，因為行動應用程式會使用 REST API 來與伺服器通訊。如果您的應用程式後端需要連線至 Exchange Server，您可以使用回呼權杖來進行 REST API 呼叫。如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Outlook 增益集中的 Outlook REST API](./use-rest-api.md)。

trans-unit.source: The [makeEwsRequestAsync](../../reference/outlook/Office.context.mailbox.md) API is not supported on mobile since the mobile app uses REST APIs to communicate with the server.
trans-unit.target: The [makeEwsRequestAsync](../../reference/outlook/Office.context.mailbox.md) API is not supported on mobile since the mobile app uses REST APIs to communicate with the server.

trans-unit.source: If your app backend needs to connect to the Exchange server, you can use the callback token to make REST API calls.
trans-unit.target: If your app backend needs to connect to the Exchange server, you can use the callback token to make REST API calls.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Use the Outlook REST APIs from an Outlook add-in](./use-rest-api.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Use the Outlook REST APIs from an Outlook add-in](./use-rest-api.md).

trans-unit.source: When you submit your add-in to the store with [MobileFormFactor](../../reference/manifest/mobileformfactor.md) in the manifest, you'll need to agree to our developer addendum for add-ins on iOS, and you must submit your Apple Developer ID for verification.
trans-unit.target: 當您將增益集提交至資訊清單中具有 [MobileFormFactor](../../reference/manifest/mobileformfactor.md) 的市集時，您必須同意我們針對 iOS 上的增益集所提供的開發人員增補合約，而且您必須提交您的 Apple 開發人員 ID 驗證以供。

trans-unit.source: Finally, your manifest will need to declare `MobileFormFactor`, and have the correct types of [controls](../../reference/manifest/control.md) and [icon sizes](../../reference/manifest/icon.md) included.
trans-unit.target: 最後，您的資訊清單必須宣告 `MobileFormFactor`，並包含正確的[控制項](../../reference/manifest/control.md)類型和[圖示大小](../../reference/manifest/icon.md)。

trans-unit.source: What makes a good scenario for mobile add-ins?
trans-unit.target: 行動裝置增益集的良好案例為何？

trans-unit.source: Remember that the average Outlook session length on a phone is much shorter than on a PC. That means your add-in must be fast, and the scenario must allow the user to get in, get out, and get on with their email workflow.
trans-unit.target: 請記住，電話上的平均 Outlook 工作階段長度比 PC 上的平均 Outlook 工作階段長度短許多。這表示您的增益集必須很快速，而案例必須可讓使用者進出集使用其電子郵件工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the average Outlook session length on a phone is much shorter than on a PC.
trans-unit.target: Remember that the average Outlook session length on a phone is much shorter than on a PC.

trans-unit.source: That means your add-in must be fast, and the scenario must allow the user to get in, get out, and get on with their email workflow.
trans-unit.target: That means your add-in must be fast, and the scenario must allow the user to get in, get out, and get on with their email workflow.

trans-unit.source: Here are examples of scenarios that make sense in Outlook Mobile.
trans-unit.target: 以下是 Outlook Mobile 中有意義的案例範例。

trans-unit.source: The add-in brings valuable information into Outlook, helping users triage their email and respond appropriately. Example: a CRM add-in that lets the user see customer information and share appropriate information.
trans-unit.target: 此增益集可在 Outlook 中顯示重要的資訊，協助使用者將其電子郵件分類並適當地回應。範例︰可讓使用者查看客戶資訊及共用適當資訊的 CRM 增益集。

trans-unit.source: The add-in brings valuable information into Outlook, helping users triage their email and respond appropriately.
trans-unit.target: The add-in brings valuable information into Outlook, helping users triage their email and respond appropriately.

trans-unit.source: Example: a CRM add-in that lets the user see customer information and share appropriate information.
trans-unit.target: Example: a CRM add-in that lets the user see customer information and share appropriate information.

trans-unit.source: The add-in adds value to the user's email content by saving the information to a tracking, collaboration, or similar system. Example: an add-in that lets users turn emails into task items for project tracking, or help tickets for a support team.
trans-unit.target: 此增益集可將資訊儲存到追蹤、共同作業或類似的系統，讓使用者的電子郵件內容更有價值。範例︰此增益集可讓使用者將電子郵件變成工作項目以便進行專案追蹤，或協助處理技術支援小組的票證。

trans-unit.source: The add-in adds value to the user's email content by saving the information to a tracking, collaboration, or similar system.
trans-unit.target: The add-in adds value to the user's email content by saving the information to a tracking, collaboration, or similar system.

trans-unit.source: Example: an add-in that lets users turn emails into task items for project tracking, or help tickets for a support team.
trans-unit.target: Example: an add-in that lets users turn emails into task items for project tracking, or help tickets for a support team.

trans-unit.source: There are definitely other great scenarios out there, so if you have an idea for an add-in that expands beyond these, please reach out to us using the [form here](https://aka.ms/outlookmobileaddin) to get feedback on whether this is an acceptable scenario for Outlook Mobile. We'll be happy to provide guidance, and the more information you can provide the better. We love a good UI walkthrough!
trans-unit.target: 絕對還有其他很棒的案例，所以如果您認為有超越這些案例的增益集，請經由[這裡](https://aka.ms/outlookmobileaddin)與我們聯繫，以取得這是否為可接受之 Outlook Mobile 案例的意見反應。我們很高興提供相關指引，並期待您能提供更詳細的資訊。我們喜歡完美的 UI 逐步解說！

trans-unit.source: There are definitely other great scenarios out there, so if you have an idea for an add-in that expands beyond these, please reach out to us using the [form here](https://aka.ms/outlookmobileaddin) to get feedback on whether this is an acceptable scenario for Outlook Mobile.
trans-unit.target: There are definitely other great scenarios out there, so if you have an idea for an add-in that expands beyond these, please reach out to us using the [form here](https://aka.ms/outlookmobileaddin) to get feedback on whether this is an acceptable scenario for Outlook Mobile.

trans-unit.source: We'll be happy to provide guidance, and the more information you can provide the better.
trans-unit.target: We'll be happy to provide guidance, and the more information you can provide the better.

trans-unit.source: We love a good UI walkthrough!
trans-unit.target: We love a good UI walkthrough!

trans-unit.source: **An example user interaction to create a Trello card from an email message**
trans-unit.target: **從電子郵件郵件建立 Trello 卡的使用者互動範例**

trans-unit.source: An animated GIF showing user interaction with an Outlook Mobile add-in
trans-unit.target: 顯示使用者與 Outlook Mobile 增益集互動的動畫 GIF

trans-unit.source: Testing your add-ins on mobile
trans-unit.target: 在行動裝置上測試您的增益集

trans-unit.source: To test an add-in on Outlook Mobile, you can side-load an add-in to an O365 or Outlook.com account. In the Outlook Web App, go to the settings gear, and choose "Manage Integrations" or "Manage Add-ins." Near the top, click where it says "Click here to add a custom add-in" and upload your manifest. Make sure your manifest is properly formatted to contain `MobileFormFactor` or it won't load.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Outlook Mobile 上測試增益集，您可以將增益集載入至 O365 或 Outlook.com 帳戶。在 Outlook Web App 中，移至設定齒輪圖，然後選擇 [管理整合] 或 [管理增益集]。按一下最上層附近的「按一下這裡以新增自訂增益集」，並上載您的資訊清單。請確定您的資訊清單已適當格式化成包含 `MobileFormFactor`，否則無法載入。

trans-unit.source: To test an add-in on Outlook Mobile, you can side-load an add-in to an O365 or Outlook.com account.
trans-unit.target: To test an add-in on Outlook Mobile, you can side-load an add-in to an O365 or Outlook.com account.

trans-unit.source: In the Outlook Web App, go to the settings gear, and choose "Manage Integrations" or "Manage Add-ins."
trans-unit.target: In the Outlook Web App, go to the settings gear, and choose "Manage Integrations" or "Manage Add-ins."

trans-unit.source: Near the top, click where it says "Click here to add a custom add-in" and upload your manifest.
trans-unit.target: Near the top, click where it says "Click here to add a custom add-in" and upload your manifest.

trans-unit.source: Make sure your manifest is properly formatted to contain `MobileFormFactor` or it won't load.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your manifest is properly formatted to contain `MobileFormFactor` or it won't load.

trans-unit.source: Once your add-in is working, make sure to test it on different screen sizes, including phones and tablets. You should make sure it meets accessibility guidelines for contrast, font size, and color, as well as being usable with a screen reader such as VoiceOver on iOS or TalkBack on Android.
trans-unit.target: 您的增益集一旦運作，請務必在不同尺寸的螢幕 (包括電話和平板) 上進行測試。您應確定它符合對比、字型大小和色彩的可及性指導方針，而且很適合搭配螢幕助讀程式使用，例如 iOS 上的 VoiceOver 或 Android 上的 TalkBack。

trans-unit.source: Once your add-in is working, make sure to test it on different screen sizes, including phones and tablets.
trans-unit.target: Once your add-in is working, make sure to test it on different screen sizes, including phones and tablets.

trans-unit.source: You should make sure it meets accessibility guidelines for contrast, font size, and color, as well as being usable with a screen reader such as VoiceOver on iOS or TalkBack on Android.
trans-unit.target: You should make sure it meets accessibility guidelines for contrast, font size, and color, as well as being usable with a screen reader such as VoiceOver on iOS or TalkBack on Android.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting on mobile can be hard, since you may not have the tools you're used to. One option for troubleshooting is to [use Vorlon.js](../testing/debug-office-add-ins-on-ipad-and-mac.md). Or, if you've used Fiddler before, check out [this tutorial on using it with an iOS device](http://www.telerik.com/blogs/using-fiddler-with-apple-ios-devices).
trans-unit.target: 在行動裝置上進行疑難排解可能有所困難，因為可能沒有您慣用的工具。疑難排解的其中一個選項是[使用 Vorlon.js](../testing/debug-office-add-ins-on-ipad-and-mac.md)。或者，如果您曾經用過 Fiddler，請參閱[使用 Fiddler 搭配 iOS 裝置的教學課程](http://www.telerik.com/blogs/using-fiddler-with-apple-ios-devices)。

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting on mobile can be hard, since you may not have the tools you're used to.
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting on mobile can be hard, since you may not have the tools you're used to.

trans-unit.source: One option for troubleshooting is to [use Vorlon.js](../testing/debug-office-add-ins-on-ipad-and-mac.md).
trans-unit.target: One option for troubleshooting is to [use Vorlon.js](../testing/debug-office-add-ins-on-ipad-and-mac.md).

trans-unit.source: Or, if you've used Fiddler before, check out [this tutorial on using it with an iOS device](http://www.telerik.com/blogs/using-fiddler-with-apple-ios-devices).
trans-unit.target: Or, if you've used Fiddler before, check out [this tutorial on using it with an iOS device](http://www.telerik.com/blogs/using-fiddler-with-apple-ios-devices).

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: 後續步驟

trans-unit.source: Learn how to [add mobile support to your add-in's manifest](./manifests/add-mobile-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 了解如何[在增益集的資訊清單中新增行動支援](./manifests/add-mobile-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: Learn how to [design a great mobile experience for your add-in](./outlook-addin-design.md).
trans-unit.target: 了解如何[為您的增益集設計絕佳的行動經驗](./outlook-addin-design.md)。

trans-unit.source: Learn how to [get an access token and call Outlook REST APIs](./use-rest-api.md) from your add-in.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何從增益集[取得存取權杖並呼叫 Outlook REST API](./use-rest-api.md)。
